SELECT ui.user_type, ui.name, n.loginID, n.notice_no, n.file_no, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_created_at , '%Y-%m-%d') as notice_created_at FROM tb_notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = n.loginID
ui.user_type = 'a'
ui.user_type = 't'
and n.notice_title like concat('%',#{stitle},'%')
ORDER BY n.notice_created_at DESC limit #{startPoint}, #{pageSize};

SELECT count(*) FROM tb_notice n INNER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = n.loginID
ui.user_type = 'a'
ui.user_type = 't'
and n.notice_title like concat('%',#{stitle},'%')

SELECT ui.user_type, ui.name, n.loginID, n.notice_no, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_created_at , '%Y-%m-%d') as notice_created_at, f.file_origin, f.file_rename, f.file_local_path, f.file_server_path, f.file_size, f.file_extension FROM tb_notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = n.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file f ON f.file_no = n.file_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{pNoticeNo};
